info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:57AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Whiteside, western Bureau and northeastern Henry Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 255 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Atkinson, or 13 miles northeast of Cambridge, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Annawan around 305 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Kewanee, Sheffield and Buda. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 19 and 61. Interstate 180 between mile markers 9 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
